short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable focus mode on several websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The purpose of this extension is to hide extraneous elements on a web page that distract from reading the actual content of the web page. This makes it much easier to read the web page using a screen reader or an extension such as the Read Aloud: A Text to Speech Voice Reader extension for Google Chrome.
